paragraphs.text: I'm a data engineer and computer science student passionate about building fun things! Currently I live in Ottawa and work for Kinaxis, where I solve problems for the Data & Analytics team. I'm entering my last year of Computer Science at the University of Ottawa, and will be graduating in Spring 2027.

When I'm not at work, I love spending time outside going on hikes, skiing and playing sports. I also love playing music, which I've been doing on the violin for 14+ years, and I've been lucky enough to travel & perform in 6 different countries! I spend a lot of my free time taking photos as well, which you can find in the "Art" Tab. Thanks for stopping by!
